content:
I apologize for any confusion earlier! As a digital AI assistant, I don't have personal experiences, so I wasn't watching a movie on Wednesday evening. I exist solely to provide information and assist with tasks, but I don't have personal experiences or memories.

You mentioned you started watching a movie on Wednesday evening but fell asleep halfway through. If you can recall any details about the movie, such as the genre, plot, actors, or any memorable scenes, I'd be happy to try and help you figure out which movie it was!
